CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 21,22 Polymers based on DTS normally have high hole mobility and strong light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum and hence the improvement in photovoltaic performance , which reached 5.1% .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. DTS (presumably a type of polymer)
2. Polymers (a class of materials)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "DTS" and "polymers".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. DTS

So, the only "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "DTS".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid "Material Name" entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTS |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 21,22 Polymers based on DTS normally have high hole mobility and strong light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum and hence the improvement in photovoltaic performance , which reached 5.1% .

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 5.1% - the improvement in photovoltaic performance
2. high - the hole mobility
3. strong - the light absorption in the visible region of the solar spectrum
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. 5.1% - the improvement in photovoltaic performance

The other two entities, "high" and "strong," are adjectives that describe the properties of the material, but they do not specifically refer to a quantifiable value.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 5.1% |
